content: The 1982 hit song "Africa" was performed by which American rock band known for their musical style blending elements of rock, pop, and jazz?

I'm here to help you with your question! The 1982 hit song "Africa" was performed by the American rock band Toto. Toto is known for their unique musical style that blends elements of rock, pop, and jazz, creating a sound that resonates with a wide audience. "Africa" is one of their most iconic songs and has become a staple in popular music. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
